Font Sizes

Bootstrap default font size SASS variable modified to provide more sizing options.

$font-sizes: (
    1: $h1-font-size,               // 24px
    2: $h2-font-size,               // 22px
    3: $h3-font-size,               // 20px
    4: $h4-font-size,               // 18px
    5: $h5-font-size,               // 16px
    6: $h6-font-size,               // 14px

    7:  $font-size-base * 0.8125,   // 13px
    8:  $font-size-base * 0.75,     // 12px
    9:  $font-size-base * 0.6875,   // 11px
    10: $font-size-base * 0.625,    // 10px
    11: $font-size-base * 0.5,      // 8px
    12: $font-size-base * 0.4375,   // 7px

    base:  $font-size-base,         // 16px
    fluid: 100%,                    // 100%

    2x:  $font-size-base * 2,       // 32px
    3x:  $font-size-base * 3,       // 48px
) !default;

Text align

Extended text-align default Bootstrap utility by .text-justify class.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Voluptatibus, atque hic ipsum odit impedit tempore non et quia. Obcaecati itaque impedit exercitationem mollitia recusandae sequi. Adipisci voluptatum numquam repellendus fuga.

<p class="text-justify">...</p>

Font weight

Extended font-weight default Bootstrap utility by .fw-bolder and .fw-boldest classes.

.fw-bolder

.fw-boldest

<p class="fw-bolder">...</p>
<p class="fw-boldest">...</p>

Letter spacing

Use .ls-{value} class to set an elements letter spacing where value is one of:

  • 0- for classes that set letter spacing to 0rem
  • 1- for classes that set letter spacing to 0.0625rem
  • 2- for classes that set letter spacing to 0.125rem
  • 3- for classes that set letter spacing to 0.1875rem
  • 4- for classes that set letter spacing to 0.25rem
  • 5- for classes that set letter spacing to 0.5rem

letter spacing 0

letter spacing 1

letter spacing 2

letter spacing 3

letter spacing 4

letter spacing 5

<p class="ls-0">...</p>
<p class="ls-1">...</p>
<p class="ls-2">...</p>
<p class="ls-3">...</p>
<p class="ls-4">...</p>
<p class="ls-5">...</p>
